data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The material of a handkerchief can be symbolic of the social-economic class of the user. It ____ not ____ because ____ materials ____ more ____, ____ because ____ materials ____ more ____ and ____ for ____ who ____ a ____ for ____ than ____. Handkerchiefs can be made of cotton, cotton-synthetic blend, synthetic fabric, silk, or linen.
data.partBlankContent: The material of a handkerchief can be symbolic of the social-economic class of the user. It i_ not on__ because so__ materials a__ more expe_____, b__ because so__ materials a__ more abso_____ and use___ for th___ who u__ a handke______ for mo__ than st___. Handkerchiefs can be made of cotton, cotton-synthetic blend, synthetic fabric, silk, or linen.
data.answer: 手帕的材质可以象征使用者的社会经济阶层。这不仅是因为有些材料更贵，还因为有些材料吸收力更强，对那些使用手帕不只是为了美观的人来说更有用。手帕可以由棉、棉-合成混纺、合成纤维、丝绸或亚麻制成。
